nodes.text: The Transit Hub was the name given to the westernmost section of the Duros Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A series of platforms spanning one of Nar Shaddaa's many canyons between buildings, it was the only part of the sector where air taxis could reach.
The Transit Hub appears as part of the Duros Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
